title: Christmas videos volume 4 (S)
brief_description: This tape features 7 Christmas cartoons including: “Rudolph the red nosed reindeer”; the reindeer with the red nose becomes the hero of Christmas: “Christmas comes but once a year”; a stranger makes Christmas a joyous one for a group of orphans: “The Kids in the shoe”; instead of sleeping, the children in the shoe sing: “Robin Hood makes good”; three squirrels masquerade as Robin Hood while a hungry fox pretends to be Maid Marion: “A Bout with a trout”; Lulu finds herself in some serious trouble when she goes fishing”: “A Day at the zoo”; the animals are out to entertain from the confines of their cages: “Bars and stripes forever”; a little convict takes the blame for a tougher crim.
